title: 超简命令/函数计时系统
author: RF_Tar_Railt
txt_content:
本帖最后由 RF_Tar_Railt 于 2018-8-4 11:58 编辑 

不务正业一波（懒得排版）下面以1.12版本的函数为例
1.前提一个循环函数内的所有命令会在1tick内同时运行(如果中间有引用其他函数先执行这个函数再执行下面的命令)
mc中的一个循环周期为1tick
一秒有20tick，也就是说一个循环函数一秒运行20次所以： 
scoreboard objectives add tick dummy 创建tick
复制代码一秒20tick：scoreboard objectives add sec dummy 创建sec
scoreboard players add @a tick 1 循环tick加1
scoreboard players add @a[score_tick_min=20] sec 1 当tick满20时sec加1，相当于加一秒
scoreboard players set @a[score_tick_min=20] tick 0 重置tick
复制代码这样，记分版sec的数值就会1秒加1二.计时假设需要30秒逃离一个地方，时间一到就会死亡那么：execute @a[score_sec_min=30] ~ ~ ~ kill @s 时间一到杀死玩家
execute @a[score_sec_min=30] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @s sec 0 重置时间
复制代码三.倒计时有些地图我们会看到倒计时那么：scoreboard objectives add tick dummy 创建tick
scoreboard objectives add sec dummy 创建sec
scoreboard players add @a tick 1 循环tick加1
scoreboard players set @a sec 30 倒计时30秒
scoreboard players remove @a[score_tick_min=20] sec 1 当tick满20时sec减1，相当于减1秒
scoreboard players set @a[score_tick_min=20] tick 0 重置tick

execute @a[score_sec=0] ~ ~ ~ kill @s 时间一到杀死玩家
execute @a[score_sec=0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @s sec 30 重置时间复制代码四.定时比如挂机五分钟提醒自己时间到了那么：scoreboard objectives add tick dummy 创建tick
scoreboard objectives add sec dummy 创建sec

scoreboard objectives add min dummy 创建min
scoreboard players set @a min <数值>  计时<数值>分钟

scoreboard players add @a tick 1 循环tick加1
scoreboard players add @a[score_tick_min=20] sec 1 当tick满20时sec加1，相当于加一秒
scoreboard players set @a[score_tick_min=20] tick 0 重置tick
scoreboard players remove @a[score_sec_min=60] min 1 当sec满60时min减1，相当于减1分钟
scoreboard players set @a[score_sec_min=60] sec 0 重置sec

execute @a[score_min=0] ~ ~ ~ playsound entity.arrow.hit_player master @a ~ ~ ~ 10 1 提醒玩家
execute @a[score_min=0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard objectives remove min 清除计时
